obj runtime_t:
  config:
    bool use_reg_cache;
    bool use_control_channel;
    bool use_default_net_context;
    bool use_default_net_device;
  method:
    # get config are automatically generated
    int get_rank() const;
    int get_nranks() const;
    net_context_t get_default_net_context() const;
    net_device_t get_default_net_device() const;

op alloc_runtime_x:

op free_runtime_x:
  runtime_t runtime;

obj net_context_t:
  config:
    option_backend_t backend;
    std::string provider_name;
    int64_t max_msg_size;

op alloc_net_context_x:
  runtime_t runtime;
  option_t<option_backend_t> backend;

op free_net_context_x:
  net_context_t context;

obj net_device_t:
  config:
    int64_t max_sends;
    int64_t max_recvs;
    int64_t max_cqes;

obj mr_t:
  
obj net_endpoint_t:
